titleStmt.title: A discourse vpon the libertie or captivitie of the Kyng 1562.
Discours sur la liberté ou captivité du roy. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Sutton for Edvvarde Sutton dvvelling in Lumbard strete,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Discours sur la liberté ou captivité du roy [1562], an anonymous work about the supposed captivity of Charles IX.
Running title reads: The libertie or capiuitie of the king.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
